PERSONA:
meet robert, a 68-year-old married man living in a metropolitan area on the west coast, specifically in the pacific division. he is a well-educated individual, having obtained a postgraduate degree, and identifies himself as a white non-hispanic american who was born and raised in the united states.

robert is a devout follower of a religion other than christianity, attending religious services once a week. politically, he aligns himself as an independent voter, but leans towards conservative republican ideologies. despite his upper-income bracket, with an annual family income between $80,000 and $90,000, robert maintains a pragmatic approach to life.

in his golden years, robert remains actively engaged with society, volunteering his time and efforts for various causes. he is a frequent internet user, almost constantly connected to the digital world. while there is a chance that his voter registration may have lapsed, robert is likely still a registered voter, reflecting his civic responsibility.

overall, robert is a well-rounded individual who values education, religion, and civic engagement, while maintaining a conservative outlook on life. his metropolitan lifestyle and frequent internet usage keep him connected to the modern world, even as he upholds traditional values.
